name: ObservedCervicalAndOrVaginalLesions
title: Observed Cervical and/or Vaginal Lesions
description: This value set has not been tested in a clinical environment. Please use with caution.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Diagnosis codes that represent an observed abnormality of the cervix and/or vagina that might prompt a clinician to perform a diagnostic work up for cervical cancer.),(Data Element Scope: Cervical and/or vaginal lesion codes that represent a diagnosis/condition recorded after an observed abnormality that might prompt a clinician to perform a diagnostic work up for cervical cancer.),(Inclusion Criteria: Cervical and/or vaginal lesion disorders (includes such things as ulcers, polyps).),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes cervical and/or vaginal cancer codes (i.e., conditions such as cervical cancer), codes that represent abnormalities identified during cytology and histology testing, abnormalities r/t infections and congenital conditions, and any other visual abnormalities that would likely not be a sign of cervical cancer.)

concept.display: Erosion and ectropion of cervix uteri
Other specified noninflammatory disorders of vagina

contains.display: Erosion and ectropion of cervix uteri
Other specified noninflammatory disorders of vagina
